mapper.select: select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, nickname, password, registrationDate, nicknameModifiedDate, isUnsigned, unsignedDate, isRecommendated from user order by registrationDate

select LOWER(CONCAT(LEFT(HEX(userId), 8), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 9, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 13, 4), '-', MID(HEX(userId), 17, 4), '-', RIGHT(HEX(userId), 12))) AS userId, nickname, password, registrationDate, nicknameModifiedDate, isUnsigned, unsignedDate, isRecommendated from user where userId = UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userid} , '-', ''))
mapper.insert: insert into user( userId, nickname, password, isRecommendated ) values ( UNHEX(REPLACE(#{userId} , '-', '')), nickname, password, isRecommendated )
